title: Call of Duty: WWII for PS4 / Xbox One
description: Newegg offers Call of Duty: WWII for PlayStation 4 or Xbox One for $59.99. Coupon code "EMCPEPV44" cuts that price to $35.99. With free shipping, that's $2 under our mention from two weeks ago and the lowest price we could find by $14.

title: Ocean Spray Cranberry Juice Cans 48-Pack
description:
Amazon offers the Ocean Spray Cranberry Juice 5.5-oz. Cans 48-Pack for $15.06. Checkout via Subscribe and Save to cut that price to $14.31. With free shipping, that's a buck off, and the lowest price we could find.

Note: Be sure to cancel your subscription once your order ships to avoid being billed for further shipments.

title: 16 Duracell Batteries, $16 Office Depot GC
description:
Office Depot and OfficeMax again offers the Duracell Coppertop Alkaline AAA Batteries 16-Pack or Duracell Coppertop Alkaline AA Batteries 16-Pack for $15.99. Plus, Office Depot and OfficeMax Rewards members will bag a $15.99 Rewards Credit for free. (Not a member? It's free to sign up.) Choose free in-store pickup to dodge the $9.95 shipping fee. That's tied with our mention from a month ago and the best deal we could find now by at least $11.) Deal is limited to two per customer.

Note: Allow up to five weeks after the promotion ends for Rewards to become available in your account.

title: BioBidet Prestige Elongated Bidet Toilet Seat
description: Woot offers the BioBidet Prestige Elongated Bidet Toilet Seat for $279.99 plus $5 for shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $164. It features a side control panel, 3-in-1 nozzle system, heated seat, heated air dryer, massage, and oscillating mode.

title: Destiny: The Taken King Legendary Ed Xbox One
description: Microsoft Store offers Destiny: The Taken King Legendary Edition for Xbox One for $7.99 with free shipping. That's $7 under our mention from last March and the lowest price we've seen (it's a low today by $10).

title: Asus VivoBook Flip Pentium 14" Touch Laptop
description: Walmart offers the 3.3-lb. Asus VivoBook Flip TP401 Intel Pentium Apollo Lake 1.1GHz 14" Touchscreen 2-in-1 Laptop for $299 with free shipping. That's tied with our mention from three weeks ago and the lowest price we could find today by $80. It features an Intel Pentium N4200 1.1GHz Apollo Lake quad-core processor, 14" 1366x768 (720p) touchscreen LCD, 4GB RAM, 64GB eMMC storage, 802.11ac wireless, Bluetooth, 4.1, USB 3.1 Type-C, micro HDMI, 2-cell battery, and Windows 10 Home.

title: Select Minecraft for Kids eBooks
description:
Amazon offers a range of Minecraft for kids Kindle eBooks for free. That's up to $2 off and the lowest price we could find. Titles include:
  • The Friendly Creeper Diaries (Book 1): The Creeper Village
  • The Friendly Creeper Diaries: The Moon City (Book 4): The Underground City
  • The Friendly Creeper Diaries: The Relics of Dragons (Book 7): Possessed by Herobrine
  • Minecraft: Battle of Legends Book 1
  • The Obsidian Cube (Book 1): An Unknown Past

title: Anker SoundBuds Slim Wireless Earbuds
description: AnkerDirect via Amazon offers Prime members the Anker SoundBuds Slim Wireless Earbuds in Blue or Red for $18.99 with free shipping. That's a buck under our September mention and the lowest price we could find now by $9. Features include IPX4 rated water-resistance, 6mm drivers, and three sizes of ear tips.

title: Gourmia 6-Quart Pressure Cooker
description: Best Buy via eBay offers the Gourmia 6-Quart Pressure Cooker in Stainless Steel/Black for $49.99 with free shipping. That's $10 under our mention from three weeks ago, $70 off, and the lowest price we could find. It features a keep-warm function, touchpad controls, and a digital display.

title: Chase Sapphire Preferred® Card
Smart Color Art Dual Tip Brush Pen 48-Pack
description: Smart Color Art via Amazon offers the Smart Color Art Dual Tip Brush Pen 48-Pack for $15.79 with free shipping. That's $11 under our June mention and the lowest price we could find by $2.

title: WD 8TB Easystore USB 3.0 Desktop Hard Drive
description: Best Buy offers the Western Digital 8TB Easystore USB 3.0 Desktop Hard Drive for $159.99 with free shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $25, although we saw this for $20 less last month. It includes WD Backup and Drive Utilities software and also comes with a choice of $20 Shutterfly Credit or 8x8" Photo Book.

title: Refurb Asus ZenFone 3 16GB Android Phone
description:
Newegg offers the refurbished Unlocked Asus ZenFone 3 Max 16GB 4G LTE GSM Android Smartphone in Gray for $69.99 via the instructions below. With free shipping, that's $10 under last month's mention, $60 under the lowest price we could find for a new unit and the best price we've seen in any condition. The phone features a 4,100mAh battery, which lasts up to 30 days on standby and doubles as a power bank. Additional features include an MediaTek MT6737 1.25GHz quad-core processor, 5.2" 1280x720 (720p) IPS touchscreen LCD, 2GB RAM, 16GB storage, 13-megapixel rear camera, 5-megapixel front-facing camera, 1080p video recording, 802.11n wireless, Bluetooth 4.0, microSD card slot, fingerprint sensor, and Android 6.0 OS (Marshmallow). Deal ends January 31. To get this deal:
  1. Add the refurbished Unlocked Asus ZenFone 3 Max 16GB 4G LTE GSM Android Smartphone to cart for $89.99
  2. coupon code "EMCSPEPV3" cuts it to $79.99
  3. redeem this $10 rebate for a final price of $69.99
Note: A 90-day warranty applies but it's unclear who covers it.

title: Refurb Hitachi 4-Gal. Portable Air Compressor
description:
Big Sky tool offers the refurbished Hitachi 4-Gallon Portable Electric Twin Stack Air Compressor for $83.97 plus around $9 for shipping. That's $6 under our mention from last April and about $59 under the lowest price we could find for a new unit. It weighs 53 lbs. and features a 15-amp direct-drive induction motor, cast iron pump, steel-encased gauges, and thermal overload protection.

Note: A 1-year Hitachi warranty applies.

title: Texsport BBQ Swivel Grill
description: Walmart offers the Texsport Heavy Duty Outdoor Barbecue Swivel Grill for $32.09 with free shipping. (Amazon charges the same.) That's $6 under our November mention and the lowest price we could find by $5. It features a 24" x 16" cooking surface and is height adjustable to 17".

title: Alpine Swiss Men's Grant Jacket
description: Art of Deals via eBay offers the Alpine Swiss Men's Grant 28" Open Bottom Jacket in Black or Gray for $24.99 with free shipping. (Alpine Swiss Store via Amazon charges the same.) That's $5 under our mention from two weeks ago, $150 off list, and the lowest price we've seen. It's available in sizes S to XXL.

title: Covington Men's Sheffield Loafers
description: Sears offers the Covington Men's Sheffield Loafers in Black or Brown for $14.78. Coupon code "SAVINGS" cuts it to $12.56. Choose in-store pickup to dodge the $4.49 shipping charge, or spend $25 or more to qualify for free shipping. That's $47 off list and the best price we could find. They're available in sizes 7.5 to 13.

title: Tool Storage and Organization at Amazon
description:
Amazon discounts a selection of tool storage and organization items. Plus, some items receive up to an extra $30 off via on-page clippable coupons. All these orders receive free shipping. A couple of best bets:
  • Waterloo 26" Wide 5-Drawer Tool Chest for $174.99 via the on-page $10 clippable coupon (pictured, $10 low)
  • CAT 5-Drawer Ball Bearing Tool Chest for $204.95 (low by $30)

title: Alkai Men's Griffin Polarized Sunglasses
description: AKASO-Store via Amazon offers Prime members the Alkai Men's Griffin Sport Polarized Sunglasses in Black/Red or Black/Silver for $9.99 with free shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $7. Features include TR90 frame material and 100% UV protection.

title: Barclaycard Arrival Plus™ MasterCard®
New Balance Men's Strobe Sneakers
description: Ending today, Joe's New Balance Outlet offers the New Balance Men's Strobe Running Shoes in Black for $29.99. Coupon code "DOLLARSHIP" unlocks $1 for shiping. That's tied with our expired mention from three days ago and the lowest price we could find by $21. They're available in regular and wide widths in select sizes from 8 to 13.

title: Lapasa Men's Full Zip Polar Fleece Jacket
description:
ASAS.USA via Amazon offers the Lapasa Men's Full Zip Polar Fleece Jacket in Blue or Grey for $19.99. Coupon code "A9FRLDRG" cuts that price to $15.99. With free shipping for Prime members, that's $2 under last month's mention, $15 off list, and the lowest price we could find. It's available in sizes S and XXL only. Deal ends January 31.

Note: It's available in a wider selection of sizes and colors for $20.79 via the same code as above.

title: Tseoa 12-Piece Manicure Set
description: Tseoa Direct via Amazon offers Prime members its Tseoa 12-Piece Manicure Set for $5.45 with free shipping. That's tied with our October mention as the lowest price we've seen. (It's the best today by $2.) The set includes cuticle nippers, nail clippers, nail scissors, and ear pick. Deal ends February 15.

title: Lapasa Women's Yoga Pants
description:
ASAS.USA via Amazon offers the Lapasa Women's Yoga Pants in Jade for $9.99. Coupon code "Q7ZKBORN" cuts it to $7.49. With free shipping for Prime members, that's $3 off list and the lowest price we could find. They're available in sizes M to XL. Deal ends January 31.

Note: They're available in a wider selection of sizes and colors for $14.99 via the same code as above.

title: Austrian Crystal Tennis Bracelet 5-Pack
description: Win Pearl offers this Austrian Crystal Tennis Bracelet 5-Pack for $46.99. Coupon code "dealnews78" cuts that to $10.34. With free shipping, that's $4 under our November mention, $40 off, and the lowest price we could find. It includes five different styles. Deal ends January 10.

title: Kitclan Magnet Wristband
description: Kitclan via Amazon offers the Kitclan Magnet Wristband for $12.99. Coupon code "LVX6HH39" cuts it to $8.70. With free shipping for Prime members, that's $4 off list and the lowest price we could find. It features an adjustable velcro strap, 1,680-denier ballistic polyester construction, and five powerful magnets. Deal ends January 9.

title: Tacklife Stainless Steel Digital Caliper
description: Tacklife Direct via Amazon offers Prime members the Tacklife Stainless Steel Digital Caliper for $17.97. Coupon code "64GTMDPV" cuts it to $12.58. With free shipping for Prime members, that's $4 under our mention from last November and the lowest price we could find by $16. It features three measuring modes and an LCD screen. Deal ends January 10.

title: Tacklife EM02 Classic Power Meter
description: Tacklife via Amazon offers its Tacklife EM02 Classic Power Meter for $19.97. Coupon code "XML7D4EH" cuts it to $14.78. With free shipping for Prime members, that's a buck under our mention from last September and the lowest price we could find today by $10. It features an LCD display, four controlling buttons, overload protection, and data hold. Deal ends January 10.

title: Tacklife 12-in-1 Stainless Steel Multi-Pliers
description: TacklifeDirect via Amazon offers Prime members its Tacklife Advanced 12-in-1 Stainless Steel Multi-Pliers in All Metal for $5.97 with free shipping. That's $3 under our mention from three days ago, $22 off list, and the lowest price we've seen. It includes a carrying case.

title: Chase Freedom Unlimited® Card
Dr. Meter Soft Baby Proof Corner Guard 24pk
description: Thousand Shore Inc. via Amazon offers the Dr. Meter Soft Baby Proofing Corner Guards 24-Pack for $10.99. Coupon code "BDB8MBVX" cuts it to $6. With free shipping for Prime members, that's $5 off list and the lowest price we could find. It includes 12 L-shaped corner guards and 12 ball-shaped corner guards. Deal ends January 12.

title: Harper's Bazaar 1-Year Subscription
description: Mercury Magazines offers a Harper's Bazaar 1-Year Subscription (10 issues) for free when you fill out a short form. That's tied with our September mention and the lowest price we could find by $15 today.

title: Rocket League for PC
description:
CDKeys offers Steam downloads of Rocket League for Windows for $7.89. That's the best price we could find for this soccer-meets-driving game by $8, although it was pennies less two weeks ago.

Note: New customers can provide an email address on the CDKeys Facebook page to get a unique coupon code that cuts an extra 5% off.

title: Electric Fireplace with 44" Mantle
description: Walmart offers this Electric Fireplace with 44" Mantle in Black for $119. Opt for in-store pickup to drop it to $116.91. (You can also opt for free shipping if you aren't interested in the pickup discount.) That's $10 under our mention from a week ago, $64 off list, and the lowest price we've seen. This 3,750-BTU fireplace is designed to heat rooms up to 325 square feet.

title: LifeStraw Mission Water Purification System
description: Exclusively for Prime members, Amazon offers the LifeStraw Mission Water Purification System for $74.99 with free shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $55. This BPA-free device enables you to safely drink contaminated water. It purports to remove almost 100% of waterborne bacteria and protozoan parasites and will filter up to 18,000 liters of water.

title: Breville Juice Fountain Plus Juice Extractor
description: Bloomingdale's offers the Breville Juice Fountain Plus 850-watt Juice Extractor for $89.99. Plus, Loyallist members bag free shipping. (Not a member? It's free to join.) That's the lowest price we could find by $12. It features an 850-watt dual-speed motor, stainless-steel cutting disc, safety locking, and dishwasher-safe parts.

title: Modway Edge Ergonomic Mesh Back Office Chair
description: Amazon offers the Modway Edge Ergonomic Mesh Back Vinyl Office Chair With Flip-Up Arms in Black for $122.39 with free shipping. (Home Depot charges the same.) That's the lowest price we could find by $22. It features adjustable height, tilt, and tension.

title: Monarch Bonded Leather Swivel Glider Recliner
description: Amazon offers the Monarch Specialties Bonded Leather Swivel Glider Recliner in Charcoal Grey for $246.45 with free shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $38. It reclines to about 30° and features a retractable footrest.

title: Filtrete Air Filters at Amazon
description: Amazon cuts up to 15% off a selection of Filtrete air filters. (Prices are as marked, and although the discount is advertised as up to 15% off, we found even bigger cuts.) Plus, all qualify for free shipping.

title: Liberty Mutual Auto Insurance
description:
Liberty Mutual offers discounted rates on policies for teen drivers. You may qualify for rate reductions if your teen is:
  • Under the age of 21 and completes a qualifying driver training program
  • living at a school more than 100 miles from your home and occasionally drives your vehicle
  • under the age of 25, who achieve at least a B (3.0) average

title: RCA 43" 4K LED LCD UHD TV
description: Walmart offers the RCA 43" 4K LED-Backlit LCD Ultra HD TV, model no. RTU4300, for $269.99 with free shipping. That's tied with our November mention and the lowest price we could find by $38. It features a 3840x2160 (2160p) native resolution, LED backlight, and four HDMI inputs.

title: Razor Power Core 90 Electric Scooter
description: Walmart offers the Razor Power Core 90 Electric Scooter in Green or Pink for $88 with free shipping. (Amazon offers it for the same price.) That's tied with our November mention and the lowest price we could find by $12. It features a top speed of 10mph, hand-operated front brake, retractable kick stand, and ride time of up to 70 minutes.

title: American Rag Women's Faux-Fur Hooded Parka
description: Macy's offers the American Rag Women's Faux-Fur Hooded Parka in several colors (Olive/White Combo pictured) for $39.99. Pad your order with a beauty item (they start at $3) to bag free shipping; otherwise, shipping adds $10.95. That's $57 off and the lowest price we could find. It's available in select sizes from XXS to XL. Deal ends January 7.

title: Bell Automotive Roadside Emergency Kit
description: Pep Boys via eBay offers the Bell Automotive Products Premium Roadside Emergency Kit for $35.99 with free shipping. That's $9 under the lowest price we could find for a similar set elsewhere. The kit includes an 8-foot booster cable, tire sealant, LED flashlight, three AAA batteries, glow sticks, multi-tool, slip joint pliers, 2-in-1 screwdriver, 24" elastic tie down, cable ties, electrical tape, duct tape, shop towel, nitrile gloves, jersey gloves, safety vest, rain poncho, fleece blanket, space blanket, first aid kit, and a help sign.

title: Nike Men's Therma Fit KO Crew Shirt
description: Proozy offers the Nike Men's Therma Fit KO Crew Shirt in several colors (Black pictured) for $19.99 with free shipping. That's $35 off and the lowest price we could find. It's available in sizes XS to 3XL L to XXL.

title: Bosch 12V 2-Speed Drill/Driver Kit
description: Amazon offers the Bosch 12-volt 2-Speed Drill/Driver Kit for $99 with free shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $28. It includes two batteries, charger, and carrying case.

title: JOOLA Table Tennis Table Cover
description: Walmart offers the JOOLA Table Tennis Table Cover for $21.60. (Sears offers it for the same price.) Opt for in-store pickup to dodge the $5.99 shipping charge. That's the lowest price we could find by $8. It fits standard 9x5-foot tables.

title: Casual Home Nolan 4-Shelf Ladder Bookcase
description: Home Depot offers the Casual Home Nolan 4-Shelf Folding Ladder Bookcase in White for $89.50 with free shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $49. It measures 60" x 24" x 16". Deal ends January 7.

title: XtremepowerUS 1,500W Infrared Fireplace
description: Id-rack via eBay offers the XtremepowerUS 1,500-watt Infrared Fireplace in Honey Oak for $119.99 with free shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $7. It features a remote control, timer, and dimmer.

title: Chase Sapphire Reserve℠ Card
Under Armour Hustle 3.0 Backpack
description: Dick's Sporting Goods offers the Under Armour Hustle 3.0 Backpack in several colors (Black/Steel pictured) for $39.98 with free shipping. (Zappos offers it for the same price.) That's the lowest price we could find by $15. It's water repellent and features a laptop sleeve, side pockets, and a shoe pocket.

title: Kathy Ireland Mulholland Swing Arm Floor Lamp
description: Lamps Plus offers the Kathy Ireland Mulholland Swing Arm Floor Lamp for $99.95 with free shipping. That's $100 off and the lowest price we could find. It stands at 61" tall and features a swing arm. Deal ends January 28.

title: G.H. Bass Men's Washed Canvas Oxford Shoes
description: Nashville Shoe Warehouse via eBay offers the G.H. Bass & Co. Men's Proctor Premium Washed Canvas Oxford Shoes in Black for $34.99 with free shipping. That's tied with last month's mention and the lowest price we could find by $20. They're available in select sizes from 7 7.5 to 13.

title: Quest Hard Arm Chair
description: Dick's Sporting Goods offers the Quest Hard Arm Chair in Red for $14.97 plus $5.99 for shipping. That's tied with our October mention and the lowest price we could find by $13. It features a beverage holder, carry bag, and weight capacity of 300 lbs.

title: Alpine Swiss Men's Leather Zip Around Wallet
description: Alpine Swiss Store via Amazon offers the Alpine Swiss Men's Leather Zip Around Wallet in several colors (Antique Brown pictured) for $12.74 with free shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $2. It features a zipper closure, card case, and two separate bill compartments.

title: Blinds.com Sale
description:
Blinds.com takes up to 30% off select blinds and shutters via coupon code "NEW-DEALS". Plus, all orders bag free shipping. Deal ends January 9. A couple of best bets, with prices after coupon:
  • Norman 2.5" Ultimate Faux-Wood Blind from $19.19 (at least $5 off)
  • Levolor Vinyl Vertical Blinds from $42.69 (pictured, at least $18 off)

title: Top 5 Deals You Need to Know This Morning: A Dyson at Its Lowest Price
description: Today you can make the idea of vacuuming a little more bearable by saving big on a Dyson. Check out this offer and more in our roundup of the top five Editors' Choice deals we found last night and this morning.

title: Oops! Apple Messed Up, But You Can Get a MUCH Cheaper Battery Out Of It
description: Recently it came to light that Apple has been slowing down batteries on older iPhones. Not surprisingly, users were unhappy with this news. But now, Apple is trying to make things right and regain their customers' trust.

title: 8 Smart Ways to Save on Exercise Equipment
description: If your goal is to tone up and slim down this year, there are several ways to get the fitness equipment you need without breaking the bank. Check out our tips to help you save on exercise equipment, so you can stick to that resolution and get in shape.

title: Bank of America® Travel Rewards Credit Card
8 Things to Buy in January (and 3 Things to Wait On)
description: Ready or not, 2018 is here! That means we're done with the holiday sales and on to the post-holiday sales. While you won't find everything on sale in January, some items are real bargains this time of year — like gym memberships, bedding, and hotel stays.

title: Soufull Stainless Steel Poultry Scissors
description: yichengjin via Amazon offers the Soufull Multi-Functional Stainless Steel Scissors for $12.88. Coupon code "black855" cuts that to $8.55. Plus, Prime members bag free shipping. Deal ends January 31.

title: Chase Hyatt Credit Card
4 Months of DirecTV Now w/ Apple TV 4K 32GB
description:
At DirecTV Now, prepay for four months of DirecTV Now service for $140 ($35/month) and receive the recently-released Apple TV 4K 32GB Media Receiver for free via the steps below. It features Apple's A10X Fusion chip, which is 2x faster and provides 4x GPU performance over the previous generation Apple TV. It also supports 4K HDR content via HDR 10 and Dolby Vision. This deal includes the "Live a Little" package from DirecTV Now, which offers over 60 channels to stream live, with many shows available on demand. After four months, you'll be billed $35/month for the service, but you may cancel at any time. To get this deal:
  1. On this page, click "Redeem & Stream"
  2. create your account
  3. select the "Live a Little" tab and click "Continue with this plan"
  4. on the add-ons page, click "Skip for now"
  5. choose the Apple TV 4K and click "Add to plan", then click "Continue"
  6. you'll see a final price of $140 on the checkout page
Note: You must use Chrome or Safari as your browser to get this deal.
